XRProjectionLayerIgnoreDepthValues.summary: NOTE Experimental The read-only ignoreDepthValues property of the interface is a boolean indicating if the XR compositor is not making use of depth buffer values when rendering the layer.
XRProjectionLayerIgnoreDepthValues.value: A boolean. true indicates the XR compositor doesn't make use of depth buffer values; false indicates the content of the depth buffer will be used when rendering the layer.
